data.title: [Solved] Railway Staff College is located at
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is Vadodara.

Key Points


	The Railway Staff College is also called " The National Academy of Indian Railway ".
	It
data.text: Kolkata Police SI Admit Card for the Prelims Exam has been released. The Prelims exam will take place on 28th January 2024. The hall tickets for the same will be released on 18th January 2024. The Kolkata Police SI Notification was released for both male and female Sub Inspector vacancies, This is a great opportunity for graduate candidates to join the Kolkata Police Home & Hill Affairs Dept. A total of 309 vacancies have been announced for Sub-Inspector/Sub-Inspectress (Unarmed Branch), Sub-Inspector (Armed Branch) and Sergeant posts. The selection process includes a prelims exam, Physical Measurement Test (PMT), and Physical Efficiency Test (PET), followed by a Final Written Examination (Mains), Personality Test & Medical Exam. Candidates can go through the Kolkata Police SI previous year's papers to know the trend of the questions.
